PHRASE.LANG: Round, fuzzy, and outright adorable, this groundhog is a playful companion and always looking for a good laugh. Just don't let him see his shadow. [#Legal]
Potelée, poilue et tout simplement adorable, cette marmotte est un compagnon rigolo, toujours prêt à s'amuser. Mais ne la laissez surtout pas voir son ombre. [#Legal]
Rund, fellig und einfach nur zum Verlieben – dieses Murmeltier ist ein verspielter Begleiter und für jeden Spaß zu haben. Lass es nur nicht seinen Schatten sehen. [#Legal]
Tonda, pelosa e tenerissima: questa marmotta è un assistente giocoso e sempre in cerca di una bella risata... ma non farle mai vedere la sua ombra! [#Legal]
Esta marmota, tan redondita, peluda y adorable, es una mascota juguetona que siempre busca divertirse. Pero igual es un poco dormilona. [#Legal]
동그랗고, 푹신하고, 너무나 귀여운 이 땅다람쥐는 언제나 활달한 애완동물입니다. 다만 자신의 그림자를 보지 않도록 주의해 주세요. [#Legal]
Round, fuzzy, and outright adorable, this groundhog is a playful companion and always looking for a good laugh. Just don't let him see his shadow. [#Legal]
這隻圓滾滾、毛茸茸的土撥鼠，非常討人喜歡，是貪玩的隨身夥伴，經常尋找有趣的事情，但不要讓牠看到自己的影子。 [#Legal]
這隻圓滾滾、毛茸茸的土撥鼠，非常討人喜歡，是貪玩的隨身夥伴，經常尋找有趣的事情，但不要讓牠看到自己的影子。 [#Legal]
Round, fuzzy, and outright adorable, this groundhog is a playful companion and always looking for a good laugh. Just don't let him see his shadow. [#Legal]
